alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 5:41AM PST until February 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of three to six inches. * WHERE...Spring Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Slick, snow covered roads can be expected in Lee Canyon, Kyle Canyon, and State Route 160 near Mountain Springs.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
